flawed_nl_solution:
The first value drop of the lawnmower was 25/100 * 100 = $<<25/100*100=25.0>>25.0.
So the lawnmower was worth 100 - 25.0 = $<<100-25.0=70.0>>70.0.
Over the next year, the value dropped another 20/100 * 70.0 = $<<20/100*70.0=14.0>>14.0.
So after all this time, Ben's lawnmower is worth 70.0 - 14.0 = $<<70.0-14.0=56.0>>56.0.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75.0, not 70.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
